attributes.action: £21,600 for being a terrorist per year and £6000 for being a pensioner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have worked hard for 40 years for a measly pension yet a known terrorist
can get £21,600 per year and hasn,t put any monies into the british economy.
how can this be justifified.i have worked 40 years payed tax ins.i get a measly £6000per year and expected to live on it

rejection.details: Please resubmit ensuring that you include a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
